short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse the HindustanTimes website news without login popup. This is a PoC work with no commercial intent.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhances viewer experience by 
* Removing login popups
* Removing ads
* Full width articles

This results in better news reading experience for users and screen readers.
